Hi junit members,

Can u tell me how to test multiple parameters(taken as
input from XML file) thru asserts so that if one
fails, it should prompt the error and
continue.(Continue testing others despite one assert
failure).

Suppose i have 10 input values to validate against the
received value. I'm using a loop for a single method 
testGetValue() and performing assert for each.
Now i want that if the 3rd assert fails, it should
continue describing the failure of that assert and
test further values until the loop ends.
Is it possible using same method name with different
parameters being passed & added to the test suite??

Kindly help me!!
I have attatched the source with this mail,
-
ASHISH
